title: [Medicine] Long COVID risk falls only slightly after vaccination, huge study shows. Vaccination against SARS-CoV-2 lowers the risk of long COVID after infection by only about 15%, according to a study of more than 13 million people.

[Medicine] Dual immune response to both cancer and SARS-CoV-2 stimulated by single dose of cell-based vaccine developed by a team of Japanese scientists. The new vaccine strategy could offer enhanced protection to immunocompromised cancer patients that may be underprotected by existing COVID-19 vaccines.
